description.data: Crafted by the renowned Chivas Brothers, Royal Salute 21 is a smooth blended scotch aged for at least 21 years. This premium Scotch whisky comes in a stunning ceramic decanter that celebrates the tradition of the 21-gun salute.

tastingNotesText.data:
Taste: Full, deep fruity flavors with a subtle smokiness. The first taste of Royal Salute brings the subtleties of the nose to life. Sumptuous sweet orange marmalade flavors infused with fresh pears burst across the tongue. The second taste brings in a rich medley of spices and a nuttiness of hazelnuts that have a mouth-filling intensity and then the final warmth from hints of masculine smokiness.
Nose: Rich, fruity aromas and sweet fragrance of autumn flowers. Powerful aromas of sweet pears and citrus fruits are balanced with the full fragrance of autumn flowers. Elegant aromas of sweet vanilla and a dry oakiness are enhanced with subtle notes of sherry and smoke.

text.data: Neat or on the rocks

Crafted by the renowned Chivas Brothers, Royal Salute 21 is a smooth blended scotch aged for at least 21 years. This premium Scotch whisky comes in a stunning ceramic decanter that celebrates the tradition of the 21-gun salute.

Royal Salute was created to mark the Coronation of Queen Elizabeth II in 1953 and combines timeless tradition with the instinctive skill of the craftsman. Only whiskies that have slowly blossomed in the cask for at least 21 years are eligible. Only the finest are chosen. Only the skill of the Master Blender can tease out their truest beauty.

description.data: Jameson Irish whiskey is a triple-distilled blended Irish whiskey, as versatile as it is smooth. Whiskey like Jameson isn't just born smooth and balanced. First, we take the best of pot still and fine grain whiskeys. Then we triple distill them. Not because we have to, because we want to - this gives Jameson its signature smoothness. This tradition began in 1780 with John Jameson, and we continue his legacy to this day. Finally, we age our whiskey in oak casks for a minimum of 4 years. A unique whiskey with a perfect balance of spicy, nutty and vanilla notes with hints of sweet sherry.

tastingNotesText.data: The perfect balance of spicy, nutty and vanilla notes with hints of sweet sherry and exceptional smoothness.

text.data: Jameson Irish whiskey is a triple-distilled blended Irish whiskey, as versatile as it is smooth. Whiskey like Jameson isn't just born smooth and balanced. This tradition began in 1780 with John Jameson, and we continue his legacy to this day. Finally, we age our whiskey in oak casks for a minimum of 4 years. A unique whiskey with a perfect balance of spicy, nutty and vanilla notes with hints of sweet sherry.

John Jameson founded his distillery in Dublin in 1780 to realise his ambition of making the highest quality whiskey possible. Today Jameson is still made in our Single Distillery in Midleton, Co Cork, Ireland following our founder's tradition of using the finest ingredients and triple distillation to achieve our signature smoothness.

Perrier-Jouët Blanc de Blancs is Floral & Vivacious, produced by a historic, Chardonnay-focused estate.

Founded in 1811 by Nicolas Perrier and Adèle Jouët. The foundation of the estate, located in Épernay, has always been chardonnay. The maison owns 65 hectares of vineyards, 99.2% of which is Grand Cru, including sites in the Côte des Blancs - Cramant and Avize. This cuvée is inspired by the historic Blason de France (1955-1990), Perrier-Jouët’s first prestige bottling, in partnership with Relais & Chateau, offered only in the finest restaurants worldwide. The bottle’s slender neck and slight taper are modeled after this original cuvée.

An extraordinarily complex spectrum of fragrance and flavor that mixes well or stands alone on the rocks or neat.

TX Whiskey is a premier brand with an artisanal distillery, connecting and inspiring people through whiskey. Located in Fort Worth, TX, the brand’s Whiskey Ranch proudly sits on 112 acres of historic golf grounds making it one of the largest whiskey distilleries. With a mission to create innovative whiskeys and extraordinary experiences, the brand launched its first expression TX Blended Whiskey in June 2012, receiving both “Double Gold” and “Best American Craft Whiskey” honors at the 2013 San Francisco World Spirits Competition. As the first distillery to use a proprietary combination of grains, yeast, and barrel toasting, the brand continued to be an industry innovator with the release of TX Straight Bourbon in 2016. The single-farm sourced expression showcases the unique terroir and flavors of North Texas receiving Gold Medal honors twice in 2020 in the “Small Batch – Up to 5 Years” category at both the San Francisco World Spirits Competition and International Spirits Challenge in England. Additionally, it was awarded a 94 rating in the 2020 Ultimate Spirits Challenge and a Silver Medal at the PR%F Awards. Additional TX Whiskey expressions, including TX Bourbon Port Finish, TX Bourbon Sherry Finish and TX Bourbon Bottled-In-Bond Single Barrel were recently awarded Double Gold and Gold medals at the 2021 San Francisco World Spirits Competition.

Absolut is the Vodka for Mixing. Redefining the premium vodka landscape when introduced to the US, Absolut became synonymous with art, culture & cocktails. By inspiring a revolution in cocktail creation, Absolut launched a range of first-to-market flavors, becoming an icon it its own right. (292)

Absolut is the Vodka for Mixing. Redefining the premium vodka landscape when introduced to the US, Absolut became synonymous with art, culture & cocktails. By inspiring a revolution in cocktail creation, Absolut launched a range of first-to-market flavors, becoming an icon it its own right. Each drop of Absolut is made from a Single Source, in Ahus Sweden in accordance with over 400 years of Swedish tradition. Today, Absolut is the hero in classic and everyday cocktails, from the Cosmopolitan & Espresso Martini to the Vodka Cranberry or Soda.

A unique whiskey with a perfect balance of spicy, nutty and vanilla notes with hints of sweet sherry.

John Jameson founded his distillery in Dublin in 1780 to realise his ambition of making the highest quality whiskey possible. Today Jameson is still made in our Single Distillery in Midleton, Co Cork, Ireland following our founder's tradition of using the finest ingredients and triple distillation to achieve our signature smoothness.

Campo Viejo was established in 1959, the current winery opened in 2001. The winery is located 100 meters above Logroño, in the Rioja region of Spain, and is partially built underground and integrated into the landscape. It is the first Spanish winery to be certified as Zero Carbon Footprint, and is staffed a fully female winemaker team.

Absolut is the Vodka for Mixing. Redefining the premium vodka landscape when introduced to the US, Absolut became synonymous with art, culture & cocktails. By inspiring a revolution in cocktail creation, Absolut launched a range of first-to-market flavors, becoming an icon it its own right. Each drop of Absolut is made from a Single Source, in Ahus Sweden in accordance with over 400 years of Swedish tradition. Today, Absolut is the hero in classic and everyday cocktails, from the Cosmopolitan & Espresso Martini to the Vodka Cranberry or Soda.

Founded in 1811 by Nicolas Perrier and Adèle Jouët. The foundation of the estate, located in Épernay, has always been chardonnay. The maison owns 65 hectares of vineyards, 99.2% of which is Grand Cru, including sites in the Côte des Blancs - Cramant and Avize. This cuvée is inspired by the historic Blason de France (1955-1990), Perrier-Jouët’s first prestige bottling, in partnership with Relais & Chateau, offered only in the finest restaurants worldwide. The bottle’s slender neck and slight taper are modeled after this original cuvée.

description.data: The star ingredient of numerous cocktails, the slight sweetness and classic coffee flavor of Kahlúa make it the perfect addition to drinks made with milk or cream. Hailing from Veracruz, Mexico, Kahlúa coffee liqueur is lovingly crafted using only the finest ingredients, such as 100 percent Arabica coffee beans (which are light-bodied and smooth thanks to the Veracruz climate) and real sugarcane, giving it the mouthwatering flavor and slight kick loved by many.

tastingNotesText.data: Kahlúa's smooth, delightfully creamy taste and scents of coffee bean and roasted chestnut are perfect for crafting dessert cocktails.

text.data: Kahlua Original is the hero ingredient in many classic cocktails and drinks, to name a few: White Russian, Espresso Martini and Mind Eraser.

The star ingredient of numerous cocktails, the slight sweetness and classic coffee flavor of Kahlúa make it the perfect addition to drinks made with milk or cream. Hailing from Veracruz, Mexico, Kahlúa coffee liqueur is lovingly crafted using only the finest ingredients, such as 100 percent Arabica coffee beans (which are light-bodied and smooth thanks to the Veracruz climate) and real sugarcane, giving it the mouthwatering flavor and slight kick loved by many.

We've all had those evenings when your friend Steve enthusiastically cries out "Let's open a bar!". The day after though, you return to your day job. The story of Kahlúa begins in 1936 when four men all said "screw that day job" and actually went with it. One of the guys had a great idea, two of them forked out rich and tasteful arabica coffee, the fourth was a chemist who turned the idea into reality. Kahlúa is crafted from the finest ingredients that grows side by side in rural Veracruz, Mexico. The actual word Kahlúa has ties to ancient arabic languages and is said to be slang for coffee. Yes, there was already street lingo in the 30's. Kahlúa is not just a regular coffee liqueur brand; it’s a brand with a pretty random but exciting history. And that's because we keep on saying "screw it and let's do it" to things that are worth trying. so... Enjoy our great classic drinks. Because we all know, a good story never starts with salad. Cheers!

description.data: The Real McCoy 14 Year Aged Limited Edition Rum is real rum: unmodified and made in copper pot and column stills, then tropically aged for 14 years in ex-Madeira and American oak bourbon casks with no added sugar, flavor or chemical stabilizers.* This barrel aged rum is single sourced in a batch of 6,000 bottles from Foursquare Distillery in Barbados. This incredibly complex 750 mL bottle of rum offers wood, spice, toffee and caramel on the palate, with a soft, elegant finish, earning the 95 Points Exceptional Gold Medal by the Beverage Tasting Institute/Tastings.com, 95 Points by the International Wine & Spirits Competition, 96 Points by Wine Enthusiast and Double Gold by the 2019 International Spirits Challenge. Enjoy this dark rum neat or on the rocks. Presented unadulterated in the Prohibition Tradition of legendary rum runner Bill McCoy, this is the genuine article… It's The Real McCoy. *Gluten free, 0 fat, 0 carbs, 0 protein, 111 cals per 1.5 oz serving per Brewing & Distilling Analytics, KY. Consume Considerately. © 2023 Imported by Real McCoy Spirits, Canandaigua, NY. Rum. 46% alc. by vol.

description.data: The Belle Meade Sherry Cask Finished Bourbon represents the best of Old and New World whiskey. This bourbon is rested in Oloroso Sherry casks, imparting the intense flavor of more than 20 years of sherry production. Exudes flavors of rich dried stone fruit with caramel and floral notes, followed by rye spice, vanilla bread pudding and spiced cocoa. Rich, intricate, and finely balanced, this 90.4-proof, nonchill-filtered bourbon is an inspiring choice for cocktails, or enjoyed neat or on the rocks with just a splash of water. Proudly bottled in the state of Tennessee. Please enjoy responsibly. Belle Meade Straight Bourbon Whiskey 45.2% alc/vol © 2022 Nelson’s Green Brier Distillery, Nashville, TN

description.data: Craft-distilled and modern, Copper & Kings Floodwall American Craft Apple Brandy has authentic, natural aromas and flavors of whiskey and crisp, red apple. Exclusively copper-pot-distilled in Louisville, Kentucky, this brandy liquor is aged in Kentucky bourbon barrels and Oloroso sherry casks from Spain. Non-chill-filtered and with no added apple flavors or essences, oak flavor or infusion, or caramel color, this 100 proof brandy has robust structure and backbone. It's a sleek and silky American interpretation of apple brandy. Full-bodied and uncorrupted, this natural apply brandy alcohol is perfect for enjoying on the rocks, with premium brandy mixers, or in imaginative brandy cocktails; it's crisp, spicy, and a little feisty. Please Sip Responsibly. Copper & Kings® Brandy and Apple Brandy 45-62% Alc/Vol.  © 2022 Copper & Kings American Brandy Co., Louisville, KY.

tastingNotesText.data: Authentic apple brandy with earthy, root-cellar aromas of honeyed apple and hints of butterscotch, whiskey, oak, and vanilla. Apple brandy liquor with natural flavors of nutty rancio, sherry butterscotch, and crisp red apple. Sleek and silky brandy alcohol with lovely whiskey complexity and a racy backend finish.

description.data: SVEDKA Vodka is a smooth and easy-drinking vodka infused with a subtle, rounded sweetness, making it an ideal addition to countless vodka cocktails. Now made in the USA, this unflavored vodka is distilled four times to remove impurities, using a continuous distillation process to ensure that ingredients never stall or pool. The result is a clean, clear taste with a balanced body and a crisp finish, making this 80 proof vodka a bold, crowd-pleasing choice. Mix this popular vodka alcohol into cosmopolitans or vodka martinis, or chill this 100 mL vodka bottle and pour over ice to enjoy a vodka on the rocks, savoring the crisp finish. Go Responsibly. description.data: The Real McCoy Single Blended 3-Year Aged White Rum is real rum; unmodified and sustainably and ethically made in small batches in copper pot and column stills, this Caribbean rum is tropically aged in American oak bourbon barrels without any added sugar*, flavor, or artificial color. Single sourced and produced by Foursquare Distillery, a 4th-generation family distillery in Barbados, this 1 liter bottle of rum offers aromas and tasting notes of bright citrus, dusty vanilla, subtle oak, nutmeg, toasted coconut, and buttery caramel. Charcoal filtration removes much of the natural color while maintaining this light rum's wonderfully complex aromas and flavors, resulting in a rare silver sipper with a warm, gentle finish that comes with age. Ideal for enjoying neat or on the rocks, this 80-proof blended rum also works well in premium cocktails and your favorite rum drinks. Presented unadulterated in the Prohibition Tradition of legendary rum runner Bill McCoy, this is the genuine article…It's The Real McCoy. *Per 1.5 fl. oz. serving of average analysis: Calories 98, Carbs 0 grams, Protein 0 grams, Fat 0 grams, Gluten-free. description.data: The Real McCoy Prohibition Tradition 12 Year Aged Limited Edition Rum offers just 6000 750 mL bottles at 100 proof in honor of the 100th anniversary of the launch of Bill McCoy's legendary rum running at the start of Prohibition in 1920. This single blended rum is distilled in copper pot and column stills and tropically aged for 12 years in virgin white oak and American oak ex-bourbon casks with only Barbados spring water added before bottling – no sugar, flavor or chemical stabilizers.* Single sourced from Foursquare Distillery, this naturally leggy, sunlit mahogany dark rum is best appreciated straight, offering tasting notes of pronounced wood and spice, balanced with hints of vanilla, nutmeg and toasted caramel and a dry bourbon finish. Presented unadulterated in the Prohibition Tradition of legendary rum runner Bill McCoy, this is the genuine article…It's The Real McCoy (R). *Vegan, Gluten free, 0 fat, 0 carbs, 0 protein, 122 cals per 1.5 oz serving per Brewing & Distilling Analytics, KY. description.data: This High West Whiskey Gift Set, made exclusively for Costco, features award-winning, multi-varietal bottles of whiskey and ready to drink, premixed cocktails. With 375 mL bottles of High West Bourbon and Double Rye Whiskey, as well as 375 mL bottles of Barrel-Finished Manhattan and Barrel-Finished Old Fashioned Cocktails, this whiskey gift box set is handsomely packaged and ready to give, complete with each whiskey bottle's aromas and tasting notes described on back. High West Bourbon is a complex and aromatic blend of straight bourbon whiskeys aged a minimum of 2 years, producing a blended whiskey that is rich and earthy, making it a great sipper or addition to whiskey cocktails. High West Double Rye Whiskey is a spicy blend of straight rye whiskeys aged a minimum of 2 years, made for sipping and mixing. The Barrel-Finished Old Fashioned offers notes of allspice, star anise, and orange zest, while the Barrel-Finished Manhattan offers notes of black cherry, dates, and cinnamon bark. Whether those on your gift list are bourbon whiskey drinkers, rye whiskey lovers, or Old Fashioned and Manhattan cocktail aficionados, The West is yours with this bottled wine gift set, each one with four 375 mL bottles perfectly sized for sharing or sampling, making great whiskey gifts for men and women easier than ever! Sip Responsibly. © 2022 High West Distillery, Park City, UT

description.data: The Malmsey Madeira casks used to finish this Belle Meade Bourbon give it a strikingly robust flavor profile unrivaled in the world of whiskey. Fortified, “cooked,” and aged in time honored tradition, Malmsey Island Madeira is renowned for its rich, sweet, honeyed flavor. Enjoy the warmth and exceptional smoothness of this blend of non-chill filtered, 90.4-proof, 7- to 10-year-old bourbons on the rocks or neat with a splash of water. Its distinctive character also puts a delicious spin on classic cocktails. Hints of dark honey, vanilla, dried black cherry, and hints of toffee and baking spices lead the finish with a touch of malt and chocolate. Proudly bottled in the state of Tennessee. Please enjoy responsibly. Belle Meade Straight Bourbon Whiskey 45.2% alc/vol © 2022 Nelson’s Green Brier Distillery, Nashville, TN

description.data: SVEDKA Cherry Flavored Vodka is a smooth and easy-drinking vodka featuring natural flavors of Montmorency cherries, making it an ideal addition to countless vodka cocktails. Made with the finest spring water and winter wheat, this cherry vodka is distilled five times to remove impurities, resulting in a clean, clear taste with a balanced body and a subtle, rounded sweetness. A silky-smooth texture and clean, mouthwatering acidity make this SVEDKA vodka delicious on the rocks or in cherry vodka drinks. Experience this flavored vodka mixed into sweet cocktails, like the signature POM_READER vodka martini or SVEDKA CHERRY & CO. vodka drink, or chill this 1 liter bottle of distilled vodka for enjoying in a vodka on the rocks, savoring the crisp finish. description.data: The Real McCoy Single Blended 3-Year Aged White Rum is real rum; unmodified and sustainably and ethically made in small batches in copper pot and column stills, this Caribbean rum is tropically aged in American oak bourbon barrels without any added sugar*, flavor, or artificial color. Single sourced and produced by Foursquare Distillery, a 4th-generation family distillery in Barbados, this 750 mL bottle of rum offers aromas and tasting notes of bright citrus, dusty vanilla, subtle oak, nutmeg, toasted coconut, and buttery caramel. Charcoal filtration removes much of the natural color while maintaining this light rum's wonderfully complex aromas and flavors, resulting in a rare silver sipper with a warm, gentle finish that comes with age. Ideal for enjoying neat or on the rocks, this 80-proof blended rum also works well in premium cocktails and your favorite rum drinks. Presented unadulterated in the Prohibition Tradition of legendary rum runner Bill McCoy, this is the genuine article…It's The Real McCoy. *Per 1.5 fl. oz. serving of average analysis: Calories 98, Carbs 0 grams, Protein 0 grams, Fat 0 grams, Gluten-free. Consume Considerately. © 2023 Imported by Real McCoy Spirits, Canandaigua, NY.  40% alc. by vol.

description.data: SVEDKA Vodka is smooth and easy-drinking with a subtle, rounded sweetness. Crafted using the finest spring water and winter wheat, this unflavored vodka is distilled five times to remove impurities. Continuous distillation ensures that ingredients are constantly moving so the winter wheat, yeast, and water never stall or pool. The result is a pure, clear taste and a crisp finish, making this 100 proof vodka a bold, crowd-pleasing choice. This 1 liter bottle of vodka has a balanced body that makes it an ideal addition to vodka cocktails like a cosmopolitan or vodka martini. Tap into your creative side and craft your own signature cocktail with this unflavored vodka, or keep it simple with a classic vodka on the rocks. Go Responsibly. A silky-smooth texture and clean, mouthwatering acidity make this SVEDKA vodka delicious on the rocks or in cucumber vodka drinks. Experience this lime and citrus vodka mixed into sweet cocktails, like the signature CUCUMBER HITHER vodka martini or a Pina de Lima vodka drink, or chill this 1 liter bottle of distilled vodka for enjoying in a vodka on the rocks, savoring the crisp finish. Go Responsibly. © 2022 Spirits Marque One, San Francisco, CA.  Flavored Vodka 35% alc/vol

description.data: The Malmsey Madeira casks used to finish this Belle Meade bourbon give it a strikingly robust flavor profile unrivaled in the world of whiskey. Fortified, “cooked,” and aged in time honored tradition, Malmsey Island Madeira is renowned for its rich, sweet, honeyed flavor. Enjoy the warmth and exceptional smoothness of this blend of non-chill filtered, 90.4-proof, 7- to 10-year-old bourbons on the rocks or neat with a splash of water. Its distinctive character also puts a delicious spin on classic cocktails. Hints of dark honey, vanilla, dried black cherry, and hints of toffee and baking spices lead the finish with a touch of malt and chocolate. Proudly bottled in the state of Tennessee. Please enjoy responsibly. Belle Meade Straight Bourbon Whiskey 45.2% alc/vol © 2022 Nelson’s Green Brier Distillery, Nashville, TN

description.data: The Real McCoy 12 Year Aged Distiller's Proof Single Blended Rum is real rum: unmodified and made in small batches in copper pot and column stills, then tropically aged for 12 years in American oak bourbon barrels with no added sugar, flavor or chemical stabilizers.* This aged dark rum is single sourced and produced by the 4th generation family Foursquare Distillery in Barbados. This 750 mL bottle of rum features buttery oak, earthy notes and spicy dark chocolate on the nose, with complex wood and spice notes on the palate and a long, elegant finish. Ideal sipped straight or on the rocks, this Caribbean rum also works well in premium cocktails. Unadulterated in the Prohibition Tradition of legendary rum runner Bill McCoy, this is the genuine article… It's The Real McCoy (R). *Gluten free, 0 fat, 0 carbs, 0 protein, 112 cals per 1.5 oz serving per Brewing & Distilling Analytics, KY. 46% alc. by vol. Consume Considerately. © 2023 Imported by Real McCoy Spirits, Canandaigua, NY. Rum. 46% alc. by vol.
